game.title: The Missing Heirloom
game.objective: Recover the stolen family heirloom, a rare gemstone
game.description: Lady Whimsy's favorite necklace has been pilfered from her manor. She suspects foul play and requires your assistance to retrieve the stolen item.
game.reward: 10 gold coins and the gratitude of Lady Whimsy

tasks.objective: Investigate the crime scene at Lady Whimsy's manor
tasks.description: Speak with the staff and gather information about the theft

tasks.objective: Follow the lead to the local black market
tasks.description: Meet with a contact who may have information about the stolen gemstone

tasks.objective: Confront the thief and retrieve the stolen necklace
tasks.description: Use your wits to outsmart the thief and reclaim the stolen item
